headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

body.usage: Form labels, Input text, Table data

accent.description: Use sparingly for urgent alerts or 'Remove' actions

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-6 shadow-sm
containers.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-white border-r border-slate-200 h-screen sticky top-0

buttons.primary: bg-[#6B9A9A] hover:bg-[#5A8888] text-white shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900

inputs.default: h-10 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-[#6B9A9A] focus:ring-[#6B9A9A]/20 transition-all

cards.interactive: group hover:border-[#6B9A9A]/50 hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds. Use slate-900 for headings.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

media.icons: Use lucide-react for all UI icons (Stethoscope, Pill, Calendar, User, FileText, Printer, Download, LogOut).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js to add the custom colors (primary: #6B9A9A).
3. FONTS: Import Manrope and Inter from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' with a sidebar and top bar.
5. PRESCRIPTION PAGE: Use a 'Dense Grid' (Mode B). Patient info at top. Drug list in the middle (dynamic rows).
6. DRUG INPUT: Implement an autocomplete input that reads from a CSV file (mock the CSV data if file not present).

7. PDF GENERATION: Create a hidden component 'PrescriptionPrintView' that mimics the letterhead exactly using the provided assets. Use 'react-to-print' to trigger the browser print dialog which allows 'Save as PDF'.
8. LETTERHEAD: The print view must have the Header image at top, Footer image at bottom, and content in between. Ensure margins are correct for A4.
9. HISTORY: Simple table view of past prescriptions.
11. TESTING: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons (e.g., 'patient-name-input', 'add-drug-btn').
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the main background; keep it clean slate-50.
Use the primary color (#6B9A9A) for primary actions and active states.
The 'Frequency' dropdown should have the specific options: 0-0-1, 1-0-0, 1-1-1, 1-0-1.
The 'Duration Unit' dropdown should have: Days, Weeks, Months.
Auto-calculate end date if possible (optional enhancement).
Make sure the drug list allows adding multiple rows easily.
